description:
A Nemesis that looks like Seth has appeared, brought forth by a mysterious man who lurks deep beneath the castle. He is the one who has been making the Spectre Nemesis appear. After making his way beneath the castle, Seth was attacked by a Nemesis and blacked out, finding himself trapped within the realm of his own consciousness. He comes face to face with his memories, which causes him to awaken in his berserk form.
Source: crunchyroll
